name: Dominium - Fight for your future amongst the stars!
blurb: The first chapter in an sci-fi space-combat-trade-exploration spectacular - pulling space-sims into the 21st Century!

rewards.reward: No Reward
Supporter : thanks for your contribution! We'll send you some snappy digital wallpapers, and a digital "I Backed Dominion!" banner to use as you will.
Early Space Bird : bag a bargain early! A link to the full digital download on launch day.\r\n\r\n+ the \u00a35 reward
Dominion Registration : you get a digital download link for the full game on launch day!\r\n\r\n+ Rewards below
Game Named : your name* will be entered into the in-game character database to be used by NPC's within Dominion\r\n\r\n+ Rewards below \u00a318

Pengari Race Ticket : Free in-game entry to the new annual Pengari 40 Star Race, plus to commemorate the inaugural race - the awesome  Super Laser Racer from the BAFTA award winning indie dev - New Star Games!\r\n+ Rewards below \u00a319
Beta Unblocker : You get to test-fly the Beta build as soon as it's ready, and provide valued feedback into the remaining development of Dominion prior to its release!\r\n\r\n+ Rewards below \u00a320

The Humble Crumble Bundle : 
Get Season 1 of the adventures of Crumble, a bar owner on a far off space station that hovers near the dangerous backwaters of the galaxy. Download Episode 1 free, then receive another short story every month for the next nine months until the end of seasons cliffhanger!

Preview : http://dominion.maksw.com/story/crumble/s1e1.pdf

+ Rewards below £23
World Named : you get to name a world within Dominion!*\r\n\r\n+ Rewards below \u00a326

Story : you get the final digital copy of "Daria" - a story set in the Dominion game universe. Visit http://dominion.maksw.com/story/daria/Chapter-01.pdf for a sample chapter. (Sorry, links don't seem to work in KS Rewards)\r\n\r\n+ Rewards below \u00a328
Pathfinder : You get a Pathfinder Class vessel - designed & equipped for exploration - unique to backers! No-one else will ever be able to fly this ship.\r\n\r\n+ Rewards below \u00a330

Aegis : You get an Aegis Class Defender - designed & equipped for the Imperial Navy for Naval duties - unique to backers! No-one else will ever be able to fly this ship.\r\n\r\n+ Rewards below \u00a330
Merchant : You get a Merchant ship designed & equipped for trading - unique to backers! No-one else will ever be able to fly this ship.\r\n\r\n+ Rewards below \u00a330
Corsair : You get a Corsair Class raider - designed & equipped for fast hit and run raids - unique to backers! No-one else will ever be able to fly this ship.\r\n\r\n+ Rewards below \u00a330
Alpha & Omega : you get to experience the Alpha build of Dominion and contribute to it's development with vital design feedback, and play testing.\r\n\r\n+ Rewards below \u00a335
Star Namer : name a star system, and all the planets/moons within it!\r\n\r\n+ Rewards below \u00a337
Pathfinder : An upgrade to the Pioneer - a Pathfinder Class vessel - bigger, better, and more awesomer!\r\n\r\n+ Rewards below \u00a340
Executor : An upgrade to the Aegis - an Executor Class Tactical vessel - bigger, harder, faster and far more deadly!\r\n\r\n+ Rewards below \u00a340
Carrack  : As per Merchant, but far bigger - with plenty of room for those must-have bulk buys!\r\n\r\n+ Rewards below \u00a340
Buccaneer : An upgrade to the Corsair - a Buccaneer Class - larger for smuggling goods, harder, and far more dangerous!\r\n\r\n+ Rewards below \u00a340
Game Face : your face, in-game! NPC's will then be randomly assigned to your mug-shot, so make it a good one ;)\r\n\r\n+ Rewards below \u00a350

Creators Club : A special backer dedicated forum for submitting and discussing ideas, chat with us dev's and progress updates. Also, details for wannabe author's who'd like to contribute short stories to the Dominion Universe.\r\n\r\n+ Rewards below \u00a360
Factioneer : Create and name a faction within Dominion - inside or outside the Empire, good or bad - your call!\r\n\r\n+ Rewards below \u00a365
Genus & Species : Name a species in Dominion - give an entire race a bit of substance! Contribute towards their history and characteristics, look and feel.\r\n\r\n+ Rewards below \u00a375
Ultimate Starter Vessel Pack : ALL of the \u00a330 and ALL of the \u00a340 rewards - that's 8 vessels you can pick and choose from!\r\n\r\n+ Rewards below \u00a390

Legend : your name* and face used for a legendary character (alive or dead) within the Dominion Universe!

We will build more rewards at higher values where needed - and we will honour any higher pledges made with these rewards when they are available.

+ Rewards below £100
